Articles.Content:
0.90 has been moved to playable archive status.

Current modlist has been set up.

1.0 will be downloaded as soon as possible.

Need to recompile modlist to make sure it is up to date including correct links.

I will try out stock sandbox 1.0 as I wait for mods to update.

As mods become/are found to be compatible, they will be added to the mix and tested.

Once sufficient mods have been updated/found compatible, a new career will begin.
